jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)(of a person) be open to sexual advances from anyone
jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式)（人）接受任何人性爱的

lj.lj_ls: 他只要三杯落肚便会接受任何人的性挑逗。

lj.lj_ly: it was still anyone's game at half-time.
it was still anyone's game at half-time.

entry.def: You use anyone or anybody in statements with negative meaning to indicate in a general way that nobody is present or involved in an action.

example.ex: I won't tell anyone I saw you here...
example.tran: 我不会告诉任何人我在这儿见过你。

example.ex: You needn't talk to anyone if you don't want to...
example.tran: 不想说话的时候，你可以不说。

entry.def: You use anyone or anybody in questions and conditional clauses to ask or talk about whether someone is present or doing something.
entry.tran: （用于疑问句或条件从句）任何人

example.ex: Why would anyone want that job?...
example.tran: 为什么会有人想要那份工作呢？

example.ex: How can anyone look sad at an occasion like this?...
example.tran: 在这样的场合怎么会有人显得忧伤呢？

entry.def: You use anyone or anybody before words which indicate the kind of person you are talking about.
entry.tran: （用于描述所谈论的人的词语前）…人

example.ex: I always had been the person who achieved things before anyone else at my age...
example.tran: 我过去总是比同龄人要捷足先登。

example.ex: It's not a job for anyone who is slow with numbers...
example.tran: 这份工作不适合不擅长算术的人。

entry.def: You use anyone or anybody to refer to a person when you are emphasizing that it could be any person out of a very large number of people.
entry.tran: （用于强调）任何人，随便哪个人

example.ex: Anyone could be doing what I'mdoing...
example.tran: 我在做的事，谁都可能正在做。

example.ex: Al Smith could make anybody laugh.
example.tran: 阿尔·史密斯能把所有人逗乐。

entry.def: You use anyone who is anyone and anybody who is anybody to refer to people who are important or influential.
entry.tran: 重要人物;有影响的人物

example.ex: It seems anyone who's anyone in business is going to the conference.
example.tran: 似乎商界所有重要人物都将参加那个会议。

Sentence.sentence: Why would anyone make their work more difficult than it already is?
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: As anyone who has tried to lose weight knows, realistic goal-setting generally produces the best results.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Outside the US, Google has made sure only to scan books that are out of copyright and thus in the "public domain" (works such as the Bodleian's first edition of Middle march, which anyone can read for free on Google Books Search).
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: For example, in 1909 anyone who wanted to make a single copy of a literary work for personal use had to do so by hand.
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Is there anyone in your department who could give a hand for a few days?
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: She never expected anyone to return the books to her
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: I can't seem to get anyone in the hospital to listen to my complaints and this outdated equipment is dangerous.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Excuse me, Miss?Did anyone happen to turn in a new handbag?
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Barely anyone notices and no one says a thing.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: But I think your profession is sometimes underrated, and many people think anyone who speaks more than one language can do it.
Sentence.come: 2016年6月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section A

Sentence.sentence: Here's where there needs to be a much wider public conversation that extends beyond government agencies and scientific communities to include students, hobbyists, and anyone who may potentially stand to be affected by the use of CubeSat technology.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: I think we need to stress that while there will be some job changes, there won't be anyone getting dismissed.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section A

Sentence.sentence: Skin may seem like a superficial human attribute, but it's the first thing we notice about anyone we meet.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: When Jean-Claude killy made the French national ski team in the early 1960s, he was prepared to work harder than anyone else to be the best.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section B

Sentence.sentence: Anyone who has ever been helped by a social worker has Jane Addams to thank.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语全国卷1 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: I couldn't reach anyone at the phone number on the cat's tag.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语重庆卷 完形填空 A 原文

Sentence.sentence: But Mann thinks Terrafugia has come closer than anyone to making the flying car a reality.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语全国卷2 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: But never ever give up on your dream! Never let anyone tell you, "you can't".
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读表达 原文

Sentence.sentence: Erin had gone beyond what almost anyone would have done, finding my house on a bitterly cold night, and for that I was extremely grateful.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语天津卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: He is a shy man, but he is not afraid of anything or anyone.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语北京卷 单项填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: He was shocked, it was like he did not think anyone would ever know what he had done.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语浙江卷（10月） 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: However, 110 years is probably the longest that anyone could hope to live—if he or she is extremely healthy and lucky.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语广东卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: If anyone had told me three years ago that I would be spending most of my weekends camping.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语全国卷1 阅读理解 七选五 原文

Sentence.sentence: In the 1960s,while studying the volcanic history of Yellowstone national park,bob christiansen became puzzled about something that,oddly,had not troubled anyone before：he couldn't find the park's volcano.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: In these worlds I can become anyone.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: On september 11, 1933, famous physicist Ernest Rutherford stated, with confidence, "anyone who expects a source of power in the transformation of these atoms is talking moonshine."
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: Right after Erin took possession of my wallet on the bus, she posted a picture of my driver's license to an online forum, trying to see if anyone knew me.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语天津卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: So if we send out a robot with the single instruction of fetching coffee, it will have a strong desire to secure success by disabling its own off switch or even killing anyone who might interfere with its task.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: That's because there are a number of powerful voice manipulation 处理 and automation technologies that are about to become widely available for anyone to use.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: The battle lasts little more than half an hour, in which time around 50, 000 kilograms of tomatoes have been thrown at anyone or anything that moves, runs, or fights back.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语福建卷 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: The next day, Nicholas went out to look for help, but he couldn't find anyone.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: This is a good chance for anyone who wants to learn how to do comedy.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语全国卷2 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: Turning up at school for practice hours before anyone else had to be there.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语江苏卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: When Grylls heard about Nicholas' amazing deeds, he was super impressed that Nicholas had made it since he knew better than anyone how hard Nicholas had to work to stay alive.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: The theory also seems to explain the sudden and unexpected popularity of people was wearing, promoting or developing whatever it is before anyone else paid attention.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: This is the credibility process, through which the individual researcher’s me, here, now becomes the community’s anyone, anywhere, anytime.

Sentence.sentence: The hardest task that television asks of anyone is to turn the power off after he has turned it on.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Getting a DNT signal does not oblige anyone to stop tracking, although some companies have promised to do so.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Ask anyone newly unemployed what they want and the answer is always: a job.

Sentence.sentence: But anyone who does not have to sell is keeping away, waiting for confidence to return.
Sentence.come: 2010年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: In many such cases, a cursory search for causes finds that some small group of people was wearing, promoting, or developing whatever it is before anyone else paid attention.

Sentence.sentence: Positive feedback is important for anyone to hear.
Sentence.come: 2020年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: There has been a kind of inflationary process at work:  nowadays anyone applying for a research post has to have published twice the number of papers that would have been required for the same post only 10 years ago.
Sentence.come: 2020年考研真题（英语一）翻译 Section Ⅲ

Sentence.sentence: This is the credibility process, through which the individual researcher's me, here, now becomes the community's anyone, anywhere, anytime.

sentences.cn: 这就是“取信过程”，通过这个过程，单个研究者的“我”、“现在”和“这里”转变成科学界的“任何人”、“任何地点”和“任何时间”。

sentences.cn: 这就是能让你和几乎任何人交谈的五种绝妙方式。
sentences.en: Five amazing ways that you can make conversation with almost anyone.

sentences.cn: 任何人亲自经历所有重大事件.
sentences.en: It is impossible for anyone to experience all the important events.

sentences.cn: 这个围栏的地点选择得很有策略,可以阻止任何人到海滩上.
sentences.en: The fence is strategically sited to prevent anyone getting onto the beach.

sentences.cn: 波特太自私了, 他不尊敬任何人.
sentences.en: Potter is very selfish; he has no regard for anyone else.

sentences.cn: 他们坚持要求我不得向任何人透漏此安排.
sentences.en: They insisted that I not breathe a word to anyone about this arrangement.

sentences.cn: 尽量靠近. 我不想把任何人留在后面.
sentences.en: Stay close. I don't want to leave anyone behind.

sentences.cn: 这种模式的目标是使任何人能够在任何地点任何时候学习任何内容.
sentences.en: This new teaching way aims at that anyone can learn anything at anytime and from anywhere.

sentences.cn: 根据这些简单的指示,任何人都可以配制出一剂药.
sentences.en: Anyone can formulate a dose by following the simple instructions.

sentences.cn: 她答应不把这事告诉任何人.
sentences.en: She promised not to tell anyone about it.

sentences.cn: 尽管很多天以来岛上都是人,但除了用餐时间我们几乎看不到任何人.
sentences.en: We rarely saw anyone except at meal times despite the island being fulla few days.

sentences.cn: 说到克利夫兰, 跟那儿的任何人打听一下我们吧.
sentences.en: Speaking of Cleveland, ask anyone there about us.

sentences.cn: 并且, 能帮助的你的只有你自己, 而不是其他任何人.
sentences.en: And, the only person can help you is youself, not anyone else.

sentences.cn: 这人利用他的悲惨故事能设法从任何人手里弄到钱.
sentences.en: The man could wring money from anyone by his sad story.

sentences.cn: 一支特殊造型的雨伞, 此伞可以供任何人使用,但不可占为己有.
sentences.en: Citizen umbrellas are publicly owned, and can be borrowed and used by anyone.

sentences.cn: 它们从未被(我)向任何人披露或解释.
sentences.en: They have not been shared or cleared with anyone.

sentences.cn: 对于任何人来说,在球场上集中精力都很困难.
sentences.en: It is difficult for anyone on the field to concentrate.

sentences.cn: 保护期满后, 作品为公众所有,任何人都可无偿复制.
sentences.en: After that, the material would enter the public domain so that anyone could reproduce it.

sentences.cn: 斯:可是,任何人只要长时间不活动都会在第一次锻炼以后感到肌肉酸疼的.
sentences.en: But anyone has sore muscles when he exercises for the first time after a long break.

sentences.cn: 萨塞克斯郡的警方表示,不会就此事件采取任何行动,也不会起诉和事件有关的任何人.
sentences.en: Sussex Police said no action would be taken with it not in anyone to prosecute.

sentences.cn: 任何人, 不管阶级 、 种族或性别,都可以参加该俱乐部.
sentences.en: Anyone can join the club, without respect to class, race, or sex.

sentences.cn: 她一再丁宁儿子不要和任何人讲这事.
sentences.en: She repeatedly urged her son not to tell anyone about it.

sentences.cn: 不针对任何人任何事做出任何承诺,并永不相信任何人对你所做出的承诺.
sentences.en: Never make promise to anyone and never trust the promise that anyone makes to you.

sentences.cn: 她不希望任何人看到那封信, 于是将信烧成灰倒掉.
sentences.en: She didn't want anyone to see the letter, so she and threw the ashes away.

sentences.cn: 文森特是过敏的, 他对色彩的感受比任何人都丰富.
sentences.en: Vincent is oversensitive, his feelings about colour is more than anyone.

sentences.cn: 塞·勒斯特说过:任何人都是自己未来的建筑家.
sentences.en: Sallust said that anyone is his own futural architect.

sentences.cn: 问问任何一个刚失业的人想要什么，答案永远都是：一份工作。
sentences.en: Ask anyone newly unemployed what they want and the answer is always: a job.

sentences.cn: 但我认为你们的职业有时被低估了，许多人认为任何一个会说一种以上语言的人都能做口译。
sentences.en: But I think your profession is sometimes underrated, and many people think anyone who speaks more than one language can do it.
sentences.from: 16年6月六级真题（第一套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 去问任何一个在商的人, 他们都会告诉你商场如丛林.
sentences.en: Ask anyone in a business. They will tell you a jungle out there.

sentences.cn: 清洁的感觉可以让你舒服地缩成一团,和接近任何一个人.
sentences.en: The feeling of cleanliness makes you comfortable to huddle up or to get close with anyone.

sentences.cn: 爱尔兰共和军对任何一个出卖其成员的人都毫不留情.
sentences.en: The IRA ( Irish Republic Army ) deals ruthlessly with anyone who informs against one of its members.

sentences.cn: 很明显, 任何一个希望保持头脑清醒的人都会指出要有充足的睡眠,以及处理好压力问题.
sentences.en: Obviously, anyone concerned about staying sharp should make a point of sleeping enough and managing stress.

sentences.cn: 但对于任何一个可以接受更为人所熟知的GDP的 人而言,这并不神秘.
sentences.en: But It'should not a mystery to anyone who can live with the more familiar GDP.

sentences.cn: 对于为什么任何一个人都想在它上面投资还没有理论上的解释.
sentences.en: There is no theoretical rationale why anyone should even want to invest in it.

sentences.cn: 绝对不要对任何一个灵命不成熟的人做认罪悔改.
sentences.en: Never confess to anyone who is not spiritually mature.

sentences.cn: 这样的谎言对任何一个热爱真理的人都是一种冒犯.
sentences.en: Such a lie is an outrage to anyone who loves the truth.

sentences.cn: 你可以问任何一个使用了新的技术的人.
sentences.en: You can ask that of anyone who adopts new technology.

sentences.cn: 任何一个拿着麦克风讲话的人都能对每一位听众产生影响.
sentences.en: Anyone with a microphone is in a position to influence anyone who's listening.

sentences.cn: 在一个正在运动着的喷气式飞机里,任何一个人都可以感觉到这些发动机的力量.
sentences.en: Anyone in a moving jet plane can feel the power of the engines.

sentences.cn: 任何一个想要离开这个国家的人也存在问题.
sentences.en: Anyone wanting to leave the country had problems too.

sentences.cn: 任何一个人都可以履行社会责任, 比如不要随地吐痰, 不能酒后驾车.
sentences.en: Anyone can fulfill their social responsibilities, such as do not spit, cannot be drunk driving.

sentences.cn: 任何一个被控诉有罪的人都有权利请律师.
sentences.en: Anyone accused of a crime has a righta lawyer.

sentences.cn: 对任何一个企图改造社会的人来说,这是特别危险的.
sentences.en: This is particularly dangerous for anyone who is trying to change society.

sentences.cn: 使用该免费软件,你就可以即刻与朋友, 家人, 同事或任何一个你选择的人进行在线交流.
sentences.en: Get this free software to instantly communicate online with friends, family, coworkers, or anyone you choose.

sentences.cn: 它是一种乐趣! 问问任何一个产出很多,生活幸福的人.
sentences.en: It is fun! Ask anyone who is living a highly productive and happy life.

sentences.cn: 当一个人谁都不爱的时候, 他就可以爱上身边的任何一个人.
sentences.en: When someone loves none, he will fall in love with anyone around him.

sentences.cn: 任何一个有资格选举的人都可以成为议员候选人.
sentences.en: Anyone who is eligible to vote can stand an MP.

sentences.cn: 当一个人谁都不爱的时候, 他就可以爱上身旁的任何一个人.
sentences.en: If someone loves none, he may fall in love with anyone around him.

sentences.cn: 任何一个学生在接受多年男女分校的教育之后,在成人社会里都会感到无所适从.
sentences.en: Anyone entering adult society after years of segregation can only be in for a shock.

sentences.cn: 本周水瓶充满热情,想和任何一个关注你的人认真交往.
sentences.en: You'll be passionate and to get serious with just about anyone who pays attention to you.

sentences.cn: 给你遇.到的任何一个人一个微笑, 一句善语. 一个友好的姿势,一只援助之手.
sentences.en: Offer anyone you meet a smil a kind word, a kind gesture a h . elping hand.

sentences.cn: 因为我喜欢你, 比世界上任何一个人都更喜欢!
sentences.en: Because I Love You, more than anyone in the World!

sentences.cn: 如果你能和这个星球上任何一个人共饮, 那会是谁?
sentences.en: If you could share a drink with anyone on the planet, who would it be?

sentences.cn: 你可以拿这些当中的任何一个.
sentences.en: You may take anyone one of these.

sentences.cn: 任何一个想法都能创造一个技术分析指标.
sentences.en: Anyone with an imagination can create a technical analysis indicator.

sentences.cn: 那些失败的表现者又如何呢?其他任何一个失败者又 如何 呢?

Sentence.sentence: Teaching is an art and a craft, talent and practice; it is not something that just anyone can be good at.
